description:
Rito avoids Lala while Saki daydreams of Zastin. Ren and Lala have a gas—literally! An alien skunk gas turns them both into children. Everyone prepares for Valentine’s Day, and Rito is the object of desire for many. Yui tries to find the confidence to give her chocolate to Rito.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La Reine amoureuse ? / À quoi on joue ? / La saveur sucrée du chocolat
Queen of Romance!? / Lets`s Play a Game / That Sweet Feeling Tastes Like Chocolate
Ren`ai Queen!? / Oyuugi Shimasho / Amai Kimochi wa Choco no Aji
恋愛クィーン!? / お遊戯しましょ♪ / 甘い気持ちはチョコの味
